data_table.description: The dataset represents variables that provide further information of volunteers deemed eligible following the initial clinic visit (see also pht000249, form 1) about e.g. their diabetes history and management, diabetes-related complications, usage of (non-diabetes) medications, general medical history (including lifestyle measurements such as weight, smoking, exercise), family medical history, and socio-economic information. Data were collected at eligibility screening.

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: OBFEM9
variable.description: Date last menstrual period started

variable.name: OBPEDATE
variable.description: Date of physical examination

variable.name: OBBPDATE
variable.description: Date of second blood pressure reading

variable.name: OBMARYRS
variable.description: Years since marital status changed

variable.name: OBHEIGHT
variable.description: Patient's height (cm)

variable.name: OBWEIGHT
variable.description: Patient's weight (kg)

variable.name: OBHT12MO
variable.description: Adolescent: patient's height (cm) 12 months ago

variable.name: OBHT24MO
variable.description: Adolescent: patient's height (cm) 24 months ago

variable.name: OBWT12MO
variable.description: Adolescent: patient's weight (kg) 12 months ago

variable.name: OBWT24MO
variable.description: Adolescent: patient's weight (kg) 24 months ago

variable.name: OBONSET
variable.description: Month and year of Insulin Dependent Diabetes Mellitus (IDDM) onset

variable.name: OBRANGE
variable.description: Range (years ago) of IDDM onset (if exact date is not known) - Note: This variable appears corrupt. It was intended to code either (1) a single time of onset ("years ago") or (2) a range of two estimates. It is not clear how to interpret the values in the dataset.

variable.name: OBCALDAY
variable.description: Patient's current diet includes a daily caloric prescription (yes/no). If yes what is the caloric prescription?

variable.name: OBASPIRN
variable.description: Average number of aspirin or other prostaglandin inhibitors - containing tablets per month

variable.name: OBSMOK4
variable.description: Years and months since last quit cigarettes - Note: Variable includes 71 cases with a value (0), i.e., zero years since last quit smoking. When tabulated against variable OBSMOK5 (Never Quit), 58 of these cases are patients who never quit smoking. Is is suggested that data users treat the remaining 13 measurements as erroneous.

variable.name: OBSMOK7
variable.description: Total number of years and months not smoking cigarettes

variable.name: OBSMOK11
variable.description: Cigars currently smoked per day

variable.name: OBSMOK12
variable.description: Years and months since last quit cigars

variable.name: OBSMOK15
variable.description: Total Years and months not smoking cigars

variable.name: OBSMOK16
variable.description: Cigars per day when smoking most

variable.name: OBEXER2
variable.description: During past week: How many hours and minutes of light activity

variable.name: OBEXER3
variable.description: During past week: How many hours and minutes of moderate activity

variable.name: OBEXER4
variable.description: During past week: How many hours and minutes of hard activity

variable.name: OBEXER5
variable.description: During past week: How many hours and minutes of very hard activity

variable.name: OBSBP1
variable.description: First systolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBDBP1
variable.description: First diastolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBSBP2
variable.description: Second systolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBDBP2
variable.description: Second diastolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBSUPSBP
variable.description: Supine systolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBSUPDBP
variable.description: Supine diastolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBSTASBP
variable.description: Standing systolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBSTADBP
variable.description: Standing diastolic blood pressure reading (mmhg)

variable.name: OBPULSE
variable.description: Patient's pulse (bpm)

variable.name: OBLESS13
variable.description: Patient is less than 13 years old

variable.name: OB40PLUS
variable.description: Patient is over 40 years old

variable.name: OBSEX
variable.description: Patient's gender

variable.name: OBRACE
variable.description: Patient's race

variable.name: OBMARRY
variable.description: Patient's marital status

variable.name: OBMARNO
variable.description: Number of times married

variable.description: Patient's occupation

variable.description: Spouse's occupation

variable.name: OBMOMJOB
variable.description: Mother's occupation

variable.name: OBDADJOB
variable.description: Father's occupation

variable.name: OBFRIJOB
variable.description: Guardian's or friend's occupation

variable.name: OBPATNOJ
variable.description: Patient unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBSPONOJ
variable.description: Spouse unemployed or retired

variable.description: Mother unemployed or retired

variable.description: Father unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBFRINOJ
variable.description: Guardian/friend unemployed or retired

variable.name: OBPATED
variable.description: Patient's education

variable.description: Spouse's education

variable.name: OBMOMED
variable.description: Mother's education

variable.name: OBDADED
variable.description: Father's education

variable.description: Guardian's or friend's education

variable.name: OBSTUDNT
variable.description: Patient is a student

variable.description: Grade reached in elementary or secondary school

variable.description: How many years in trade school?

variable.name: OBCYEAR
variable.description: How many years in college?

variable.name: OBGYEAR
variable.description: How many years in graduate school?

variable.name: OBSTUDY
variable.description: Is patient now participating in another study?

variable.name: OBSCP
variable.description: Patient has a spouse, child or parent participating in DCCT

variable.name: OBHYPRX
variable.description: Patient has been treated for hypertension in past two years

variable.name: OBMEDNOW
variable.description: Patient is taking prescribed medication

variable.name: OBMED4YR
variable.description: Patient has taken required medication for > 4 months in past year

variable.name: OBMEDEXC
variable.description: Patient uses excluding medication (see Chapter 8 of Manual of Operations)

variable.name: OBDX1YR
variable.description: Patient has been diagnosed less than 1 year ago

variable.name: OBDX15YR
variable.description: Patient has been diagnosed more than 15 years ago

variable.name: OBKETON
variable.description: Symptoms/conditions present at onset of IDDM: ketonuria

variable.name: OBSDKA
variable.description: Symptoms/conditions present at onset of IDDM: suspected diabetic ketoacidosis

variable.name: OBDDKA
variable.description: Symptoms/conditions present at onset of IDDM: documented diabetic ketoacidosis

variable.name: OBC2OTHR
variable.description: Symptoms/conditions present at onset of IDDM: other condition at onset

variable.name: OBORALHA
variable.description: Patient has previously used oral hypoglycemic agents

variable.name: OBPUMPMD
variable.description: Patient has a history of previous pump or MDI (Multiple Daily Injections) use

variable.name: OBDKAHSP
variable.description: Number of hospitalizations for Diabetic Ketoacidosis in past year

variable.name: OBDHSP2
variable.description: Patient has experienced > 2 hospitalizations because of Diabetic Ketoacidosis in past year

variable.name: OBHYPHSP
variable.description: Number of hospitalizations for hypoglycemia in past year

variable.name: OBC8A
variable.description: Frequency (in the past year) - patient experienced severe hypoglycemia with loss of consciousness and without seizure

variable.name: OBC8B
variable.description: Frequency (in the past year) - patient experienced severe hypoglycemia with loss of consciousness and with seizure

variable.name: OBC9
variable.description: Frequency (in the past year) - patient experienced severe hypoglycemia requiring i.v. glucose treatment

variable.name: OBC10
variable.description: Frequency (in the past year) - patient experienced severe hypoglycemia requiring parenteral glucagon treatment

variable.name: OBC11
variable.description: Frequency (in the past year) - patient experienced severe hypoglycemia requiring assistance other than described in question OBC 9 and OBC10

variable.name: OBC12
variable.description: Frequency (in the past year) - patient experienced hypoglycemia mild enough for self-treatment

variable.name: OBC13
variable.description: Total number of times ever lost consciousness due to hypoglycemia

variable.name: OBC14
variable.description: Patient experienced more than two seizures in past two years

variable.name: OBC15
variable.description: Patient has a history of hypoglycemic episodes without warning

variable.name: OBBFPORK
variable.description: Indicate type of insulin used: conventional beef/pork insulin

variable.name: OBHPBEEF
variable.description: Indicate type of insulin used: highly purified beef insulin

variable.name: OBHPPORK
variable.description: Indicate type of insulin used: highly purified pork insulin

variable.name: OBHUMAN
variable.description: Indicate type of insulin used: human insulin

variable.name: OBD1OTHR
variable.description: Indicate type of insulin used: other type of insulin

variable.name: OBAMLONG
variable.description: Average number of units of long-acting or ultra-lente insulin A.M. (00=0)

variable.name: OBAMINTR
variable.description: Average number of units of intermediate-acting insulin in A.M. (00=0)

variable.name: OBAMSHRT
variable.description: Average number of units of short-acting insulin A.M. (00=0)

variable.name: OBPMLONG
variable.description: Average number of units of long-acting or ultra-lente insulin P.M. (00=0)

variable.name: OBPMINTR
variable.description: Average number of units of intermediate-acting insulin P.M. (00=0)

variable.name: OBPMSHRT
variable.description: Average number of units of short-acting insulin P.M. (00=0)

variable.name: OBDIET
variable.description: Type of routine diet patient follows

variable.name: OBCALRX
variable.description: Patient's current diet includes a daily caloric prescription

variable.name: OBURINE
variable.description: Average weekly frequency of urine testing for glucose

variable.name: OBBLOOD
variable.description: Average weekly frequency of blood testing for glucose

variable.name: OBBLDADJ
variable.description: Patient adjusts insulin dose using self blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: OBPHYSC
variable.description: Number of routine physician contacts patient had in past year

variable.name: OBNURSEC
variable.description: Number of routine nurse contacts patient had in past year

variable.name: OBDIETC
variable.description: Number of routine dietician contacts patient had in past year

variable.name: OBCARE
variable.description: Setting of diabetes care

variable.name: OBALLERG
variable.description: Patient has allergies to medications

variable.name: OBFLUORA
variable.description: Patient has allergies to fluorescein

variable.name: OBABUSE
variable.description: Patient has a history of drug, alcohol or substance abuse

variable.name: OBENDOCR
variable.description: Patient has a history of endocrine disorder

variable.name: OBSHRTLF
variable.description: Patient has a life-limiting condition

variable.name: OBSMOK1
variable.description: Patient has smoked cigarettes

variable.name: OBSMOK2
variable.description: Patient smoke cigarettes/cigarillos

variable.name: OBSMOK3
variable.description: Number of cigarettes/cigarillos patient smokes per day

variable.name: OBSMOK5
variable.description: Patient never quit smoking cigarettes

variable.name: OBSMOK6
variable.description: Age at which patient started smoking cigarettes

variable.name: OBSMOK8
variable.description: Number of cigarettes/cigarillos per day patient smoked when smoking the heaviest

variable.name: OBSMOK9
variable.description: Patient has smoked cigars

variable.name: OBSMOK10
variable.description: Patient smokes cigars

variable.name: OBSMOK13
variable.description: Patient never quit smoking cigars

variable.name: OBSMOK14
variable.description: Age at which patient started smoking cigars

variable.name: OBDRNK1
variable.description: Has patient ever consumed at least one (alcoholic) drink/week for one year or more

variable.name: OBDRNK2
variable.description: During last year, has patient consumed - on average - at least one (alcoholic) drink/week

variable.name: OBDRNK3
variable.description: How many 12-oz bottles of beer did patient consume during past week?

variable.name: OBDRNK4
variable.description: How many 12-oz bottles of "light" beer did patient consume during past week?

variable.description: How many 4-oz glasses of wine did patient consume during past week?

variable.description: Total alcohol consumption during past week > 560 gms alcohol

variable.name: OBDRNK8
variable.description: Did patient have periods when alcohol consumption was greater than now?

variable.description: During heavy drinking period: how many 12-oz bottles of beer did patient consume/week?

variable.name: OBDRNK10
variable.description: During heavy drinking period: how many 12-oz bottles of "light" beer did patient consume/week?

variable.name: OBDRNK11
variable.description: During heavy drinking period: how many 4-oz glasses of wine did patient consume/week?

variable.name: OBDRNK12
variable.description: During heavy drinking period: how many 1.5-oz shots of hard liquor did patient consume/week?

variable.name: OBDRNK13
variable.description: During heavy drinking period: total alcohol consumption/week > 560 gms alcohol

variable.name: OBDRNK14
variable.description: Period of heavy alcohol consumption (> 560 gms/week) lasted 5 or more years

variable.name: OBDRNK15
variable.description: Period of heavy alcohol consumption (> 560 gms/week) lasted less than 5 years
